JWT_EXPIRED: Kodi wohererejwe yarengeje igihe. Saba indi !
JWT_INVALID: Kodi wohererejwe ntiyemewe. Gerageza na none cyangwa usabe indi !
LOGIN_TO_ACCESS: Banza winjire nk'umunyamuryango w'urubuga kugira ngo ugere ku nyandiko wifuje !
USERNAME_EMPTY: Izina ryihariye ry'umunyamuryango ku rubuga ni ngombwa !
USERNAME_LENGTH: Izina ryihariye ry'umunyamuryango ku rubuga ntirishobora kugira inyuguti ziri munsi ya 5 kandi ntizirenge 20 !
USER_NAME_IN_USE: Iryo zina ryarafashwe, hari undi urikoresha !
EMAIL_IN_USE: Iyo email yarafashwe, hari undi uyikoresha !
PASSWORD_EMPTY: Ijambo ry'ibanga ni ngombwa, ntirishobora kuba ubusa !
PASSWORD_LENGTH: Ijambo ry'ibanga ntirishobora kugira inyuguti n'ibimenyetso biri munsi ya 6 !
EMAIL_OR_PASSWORD_EMPTY: Ugomba gukoresha email wibarujeho hamwe n'ijambo ry'ibanga !
EMAIL_OR_PASSWORD_INVALID: Email cyangwa ijambo ry'ibanga wibeshye harimo ikosa !
USER_NOT_FOUND: Nta munyamuryango twasanze ukoresha iyo email !
PASSWORD_RESET_TOKEN: Kodi wohererejwe kugira ngo uvugurure ijambo ry'ibanga ryawe ni :
REQUEST_IGNORE: Niba utarasabye kuvugurura ijambo ry'ibanga ryawe, ubu butumwa bwirengagize.
PASSWORD_RESET_TOKEN_INVALID: Kodi yo kuvugurura ijambo ry'ibanga siyo cyangwa yarashaje !
PASSWORD_NOT_MATCH: Ijambo ry'ibanga rya mbere rinyuranye n'irya 2!
OLD_PASSWORD_INCORRECT: Ijambo ry'ibanga rya kera ririmo ikosa !
USER_NOT_FOUND_ID: Nta munyamuryango twabonye ufite iyi kodi :
